channel.title: Programming-Language on Arrans github.io
channel.description: Recent content in Programming-Language on Arrans github.io

item.title: carbon-language/carbon-lang
item.description: Carbon Language’s main repository: documents, design, implementation, and related tools. (NOTE: Carbon Language is experimental; see README)

item.title: dart-lang/sdk
item.description: The Dart SDK, including the VM, JS and Wasm compilers, analysis, core libraries, and more.

item.title: gleam-lang/gleam
item.description: ⭐️ A friendly language for building type-safe, scalable systems!

item.title: sharkdp/numbat
item.description: A statically typed programming language for scientific computations with first class support for physical dimensions and units

item.title: kcl-lang/kcl
item.description: KCL Programming Language (CNCF Sandbox Project). https://kcl-lang.io

item.title: goplus/xgo
item.description: XGo is the first AI-native programming language that integrates software engineering into a unified whole. Our vision is to enable everyone to become a builder of the world.

item.title: AlDanial/cloc
item.description: cloc counts blank lines, comment lines, and physical lines of source code in many programming languages.

item.title: borgo-lang/borgo
item.description: Borgo is a statically typed language that compiles to Go.

item.title: yoeo/guesslang
item.description: Detect the programming language of a source code

item.title: thesephist/tabloid
item.description: A minimal programming language inspired by clickbait headlines

item.title: frol/completely-unscientific-benchmarks
item.description: Naive performance comparison of a few programming languages (JavaScript, Kotlin, Rust, Swift, Nim, Python, Go, Haskell, D, C++, Java, C#, Object Pascal, Ada, Lua, Ruby)
